remarks: Value of vector subtraction on a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmval.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvmval.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvmval.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvmval2 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) ) $.
